channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: Calibre Will Answer Your Questions About Books
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: Just pick the text you want to know more about and ask away.
item.content:encoded: Calibre has officially released version 8.11.1, and the biggest feature is a brand-new tab in the e-book viewer's dictionary lookup panel that lets you talk to an AI about the e-book. This should give you a quick, contextual answer, summary, or explanation without having to leave the application.

item.title: Your Excel Workbook Needs a Dynamic, Visual Table of Contents
item.dc:creator: Tony Phillips
item.description: This Excel navigation aid is sure to impress your coworkers.
item.content:encoded: One way to make your Microsoft Workbook easier to navigate is to include a table of contents. However, you could go one step further and create a table of contents containing linked thumbnails of the worksheets in your workbook.

item.title: These 8 Apps Make Android Auto Even Better
item.dc:creator: Cory Gunther
item.description: Do more and have fun in your vehicle with these Android Auto apps.
item.content:encoded: Android Auto has made it easier to interact safely with phone features, which is why most people use it for maps, navigation, or making phone calls. But that's not all it can do. If you want to improve your commute or road trips, you'll want to check out these awesome Android Auto apps.

item.title: Arzopa's Portable Monitors and Digital Frames Impress at IFA 2025
item.dc:creator: Sponsored
item.description: This post is sponsored by Arzopa.
item.content:encoded: Every year, thousands of exciting new consumer products are shown off at IFA in Berlin, which makes it hard for anything to catch the eye of the media or the public, but Arzopa managed to stand out in the already-crowded world of portable monitors with some truly impressive examples, and a few interesting digital frames to top it all off.

item.title: How to Pair an Amazon Firestick Remote to Your TV Volume
item.dc:creator: Mahesh Makvana
Cory Gunther
item.description: Why use two remotes when one does the job!
item.content:encoded: With your Amazon Fire TV Stick connected to your television, you can use your Firestick remote to turn your TV's volume up and down. You can also use it to power your TV on and off, meaning one remote handles everything. Here's how to configure that feature in settings.

item.title: I Experimented With Google’s Gemini Nano Banana AI, and the Results Were Wild
item.dc:creator: Aman Kumar
item.description: Create an image of anything you can imagine.
item.content:encoded: No, your friends have not joined the Marvel superhero squad, nor have they become professional footballers. The images they are uploading on their social media handles are all AI-generated.

item.title: The Best Thing About Giant TVs Is the Speakers
item.dc:creator: Sydney Butler
item.description: One unexpected benefit of upgrading to a larger TV
item.content:encoded: While the move to flat-panel TVs has mostly been great (though tube TVs still have some advantages), one area where things have taken a nosedive is in sound quality. Most flatscreen TVs today have tinny, weak sound that's frankly unusable.

item.title: The Old-School Off-Road SUV That’s Still Worth Every Penny
item.dc:creator: Tyler Dupont
item.description: Timeless design and unmatched durability make this off-road SUV a dependable, value-packed choice.
item.content:encoded: While modern SUVs often prioritize tech and comfort, one classic off-roader proves timeless engineering still matters. This 2020 model delivers rugged durability and a proven platform, making it a standout for drivers who value capability over the latest gadgets. Its reputation for reliability ensures it remains a smart buy even years after leaving the showroom.

item.title: The Narwal Flow Is a Cleaning Machine That Just Won't Quit
item.dc:creator: Nick Lewis
item.description: I've given up manually vacuuming forever.
item.content:encoded: Vacuuming and mopping are household chores that few people enjoy, especially since they need to be done on a regular basis. Luckily for all of us, robot vacuums are here to save us from the job, and few do it better than the Narwal Flow.

item.title: 3 Paramount+ Shows You Should Binge This Weekend (September 26 - 28)
item.dc:creator: Derek Malcolm
item.description: Get lost in one of these bingeable Paramount+ TV shows this weekend.
item.content:encoded: As a somewhat recent subscriber to Paramount+, I am still exploring the depths of the streaming service's offerings. So I was delighted to scroll upon the three titles below, each I managed to binge over the course of a weekend.
